WorkItem.Description:
In the PVMapper Desktop Tab I selected the Site properties drop down, put a check mark on the "Building" check box and clicked the create layer button. I received the following warning message attached.
The only thing I did that preceded this warning was select the "Google Map" base map.
![Image](https://www.codeplex.com/Download/AttachmentDownload.ashx?ProjectName=pvdesktop&WorkItemId=24890&FileAttachmentId=6599)
The details of the error are included:

See the end of this message for details on invoking 
just-in-time (JIT) debugging instead of this dialog box.

Because Window not allow to create temporary in Program files folder.
I add new dialog for selecting temporary folder.
